Package chapter_1_The_Basics

The first chapter of the book [COMPLETED]

The recipes in this chapter describe the basic syntax for lambda expressions, method references, and functional interfaces, as well the new support for static and default methods in interfaces
Recipe_1_1_Lambda_Expression
Recipe_1_2_Method_References
Recipe_1_3_Constructor_References
Recipe_1_4_Functional_Interfaces

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Recipe_1_4_Functional_Interfaces.MyChildInterface
    Functional interface which uses the @FunctionalInterface annotation
    It extends Recipe_1_4_Functional_Interfaces.MyInterface which already has an abstract (single) method.
    Recipe_1_4_Functional_Interfaces.MyInterface
    Functional interface which uses the @FunctionalInterface annotation
    If there is no method that satisfy the check of the annotation - No target method found
    If there are multiple methods that satisfy the check of the annotation - Multiple non-overriding abstract methods found
    Recipe_1_5_Default_Methods_in_Interfaces.Employee
    Interface containing a default method with an implementation in terms of the other methods of the interface

Package chapter_1_The_Basics Description

The first chapter of the book [COMPLETED]

The recipes in this chapter describe the basic syntax for lambda expressions, method references, and functional interfaces, as well the new support for static and default methods in interfaces
